name: High Yield Debt for Private Banking Clients
tagline: The Viability of High Yield Debt as an Asset Class
body: The document analyzes whether investors get a "fair deal" from investing in high yield debt.  The results were largely positive and went on to create a large windfall for investors in 2002 and 2003.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
